title: Investing account
description: The investment account allows you to publish all your proposals to potential or existing investors, thereby increasing the chance of independent actions from an external investor and arousing interest in your proposals. Additionally, the investment account helps your investor to more thoroughly familiarize themselves with your proposal and make an informed decision based on a detailed description of your offering.
text: By using the investment account, all clients can receive answers to all questions, thereby assisting you in reducing the workload on the sales department and obtaining high-quality inquiries from genuinely interested clients.
